SAPS Internships for Supply Chain Management 2024

“The South African Police Service hereby invites the unemployed, to apply for General Worker positions in various provinces.”

Summary of the Internship Programme:

SALARY:                          R102 534 per annum (level 2)

LOCATIONS:

  • SAPS Makhado STU, Limpopo REFERENCES: LIM:17/3/2024 (Two Posts)
  • SAPS Bela Bela, Limpopo REFERENCES: LIM:18/3/2024 (Two Posts)
  • SAPS Polokwane, Limpopo REFERENCES: LIM:5/3/2024
  • SAPS Marblehall, Limpopo REFERENCES: LIM:3/3/2024 (Two posts)
  • SAPS Northam, Limpopo REFERENCES: LIM:4/3/2024
  • SAPS Provincial JOC, Polokwane, Limpopo REFERENCES: LIM:6/3/2024 (Two posts)
  • SAPS Saselmani, Limpopo REFERENCES: LIM:8/3/2024
  • SAPS Seshego, Limpopo REFERENCES: LIM:9/3/2024
  • SAPS Siloam, Limpopo REFERENCES: LIM:10/3/2024
  • SAPS Marblehall STU, Limpopo REFERENCES: LIM:15/3/2024 (Two Posts)
  • SAPS Provincial POP, Polokwane, Limpopo REFERENCES: LIM:7/3/2024
  • SAPS Thohoyandou VCIU, Limpopo REFERENCES: LIM:11/3/2024 (Two Posts)
  • SAPS Provincial Supply Chain Management, Limpopo REFERENCES: LIM:13/3/2024      (Two Posts)
  • SAPS Hlogotlou, Limpopo REFERENCES: LIM:20/3/2024 (Two Posts)
  • SAPS Zaaiplaas, Limpopo REFERENCES: LIM:12/3/2024 (Two Posts)
  • SAPS Musina VCIU, Limpopo REFERENCES: LIM:14/3/2024
  • SAPS Witpoort, Limpopo REFERENCES: LIM:19/3/2024 (Two Posts)

CLOSING DATE:              24th July, 2024

      REQUIREMENTS

    • Applicants must display competency in the post-specific functions of the post;
    • Be a South African Citizen;
    • A Grade 10 (std 8) qualification will serve as an advantage;
    • Basic literacy, numeracy, and communication skills.
    • Be able to read and write;
    • Willing to work extended hours when necessary;
    • Fluency in at least two official languages, of which one must be English;
    • Must have no previous convictions or cases pending;
    • Applicants will be subjected to a vetting process which will include security       screening and fingerprint verification.
